item.title: Seven Hills Realty Trust 10-K
item.description: Seven Hills Realty Trust, which is in the Real Estate Investment Trusts [6798] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 13, 2023 had 41415 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: may - 604 instances income - 561 instances loan - 326 instances tax - 317 instances us - 305 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
